descp2: An `int`. By default, `virtual_batch_size` is `None`, which means batch normalization is performed across the whole batch. When`virtual_batch_size` is not `None`, instead perform "Ghost Batch Normalization", which creates virtual sub-batches which are each normalized separately (with shared gamma, beta, and moving statistics). Must divide the actual batch size during execution.
